title: Body Language

Don't talk, don't talk, don't talk
(Don't talk, don't talk, don't talk, don't talk)

Body language
Body language

Give me your body
Just give me, yeah, your body

Don't talk

Body language (Huh, huh)

[Verse 3]

(Ah)
Body language (Ah)
